alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:50PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rusk and north central Chippewa Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 650 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Weyerhaeuser, or 14 miles southeast of Rice Lake, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weyerhaeuser around 655 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Island Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in the Twin Cities. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northwestern Wisconsin. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Wisconsin.
